title: Pesto and salmon parcels
description: This fuss-free and thrifty tart is a doddle to prepare and uses ingredients from the freezer. Defrost the fish and pastry overnight for a speedy after-work supper.Each serving provides 752kcal, 33g protein, 55g carbohydrate (of which 3g sugars), 43g fat (of which 14g saturates), 3.5g fibre and 1g salt.
ingredients: 1 x 320g pack frozen ready-rolled puff pastry
handful fresh basil leaves, to garnish (optional)
